meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by hyperthermia.
meanings.sent1: The hyperthermic patient had a fever.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the hyperthermic child with a high temperature.
meanings.sent3: The hyperthermic cat was feeling hot under the fur.
meanings.sent4: The hyperthermic atmosphere in the room made everyone sweat.
meanings.sent5: The hyperthermic sun beat down relentlessly on the hikers.

meanings.definition: Having a body temperature above the normal range.
meanings.sent1: The hyperthermic dog was panting heavily.
meanings.sent2: The nurse used a thermometer to check the hyperthermic patient's temperature.
meanings.sent3: The hyperthermic oven made the kitchen unbearably warm.
meanings.sent4: The hyperthermic engine of the car needed to cool down.
meanings.sent5: The hyperthermic desert was scorching under the midday sun.
